channel.title: How to add health to a npc
channel.description: Ok well i made new npcs to my server the source im useing is devolution v7 some of the new monsters i added are ice queen,king blackdragon,jad,dagonoth and chaos elemetal, im wondernig how to bring there health up so it takes longer to kill. Rite now it takes like 5 secs witch is like 4 hits and he dies.

item.title: How to add health to a npc
item.dc:creator: @boxhad boxhad
item.description:
@boxhad wrote:

[quote=“Fight247, post:2, topic:282007”]npc.cfg[/quote] Not sure see when i added the npcs all i did was the autospawn and npcdrops and the drops dont even work but u can attack them and all. Maybe explain more? (THANKS)[br][br][size=1]Posted on: June 03, 2009, 01:09:04 pm[/size][hr][quote=“codypwns, post:4, topic:282007”]Search npc id in npc.cgf[/quote] ok i found the npc in the npc-handler?

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @johno2 johno2
item.description:
@johno2 wrote:

Well, try searching there HP, like make a perfect ring (1 shot kill) see how much hp you take off in 1 hit, then search it, might work, im not sure tbh.
